system.description: Effect: Before using Rollout, the user may freely attack up to half of the Movement Score of their choice. The user gains Choice-Locked 4. While Choice-Locked, the user does not consume PP. Each successive use of Rollout increases Rollout’s Power by 30, and Rollout's Power is reset to 30 if it misses or there is not a valid target.
